title: Introducing the Season 03 Battle Pass, BlackCell, and New Store Bundles for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty: Warzone
description: The post Introducing the Season 03 Battle Pass, BlackCell, and New Store Bundles for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty: Warzone appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Mike Nelson, Xbox Wire Editor
byline: April 02, 2025 by Call of Duty Staff
text: April 02, 2025 by Call of Duty Staff Track down the Pantheon moles with assistance from the Season 03 Battle Pass, featuring 100+ rewards including Mace and Hudson, plus Verdansk-era base weapons like the CR-56 AMAX and HDR. Get more with BlackCell variants and new in-Store Bundles like Jay and Silent Bob, the C.O.D.E. United Force Tracer Pack, and more. Finish the Job with the Season 03 Battle Pass! Special Agent Jason Hudson has evidence pointing to the identities of the Pantheon moles who have been working in the shadows. It’s time to finish the job he started and track down the traitors with some help from the BlackCell, Battle Pass, and Store content arriving in Season 03 of Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty: Warzone™, launching April 2 and April 3 respectively. The Season 03 Battle Pass introduces 100+ rewards including new free base weapons plus new Operators and Operator Skins, Weapon Blueprints, Calling Cards, Finishing Moves, and more.  Access free rewards including new cosmetic content and base weapons or purchase the premium Battle Pass and earn up to 1,100 COD Points as you progress through the Battle Pass Pages. For the optimal seasonal experience, purchase BlackCell, including exclusive animated Operator Skins, Weapon Blueprints, and other rewards. BlackCell Season 03: R0-Z3 Operator (Crimson One) BlackCell Instant Rewards Page, HVT The return of Verdansk marks the comeback of several Operators with extensive experience in the locale. R0-Z3 leads the Season 03 BlackCell content in her “R0-Z3” Operator Skin alongside a host of other unlockable BlackCell content including additional Operator Skins and Weapon Blueprints sporting animated fragmentation. Additional BlackCell Instant Rewards Content Get the ultimate Battle Pass experience by purchasing BlackCell, offering complete access to all the rewards available in the Season 03 Battle Pass. A purchase grants immediate access to the BlackCell Instant Rewards page, giving the following items: 20 Battle Pass Tier Skips 1,100 COD Points The “R0-Z3” BlackCell Operator The “Energy Siphon” Mastercraft Blueprint for the XM4 Assault Rifle The “Goodest Boy” Companion Finishing Move The “Martial Arts” Emote The “BlackCell” Clan Tag (showcased in Lobbies and Winner’s Circles) BlackCell Daily Challenge (see below) BlackCell owners can additionally unlock page after page of additional rewards throughout the Season 03 Battle Pass, including: Up to 10 BlackCell-exclusive skins for Mace (two skins), Hudson (two skins), Woods, Marshall, Maya, Park, Stone, and Toro. Up to seven BlackCell-exclusive Weapon Blueprints for the XM4 (Assault Rifle), Feng 82 (LMG), GPMG-7 (LMG), Tanto .22 (SMG), ASG-89 (Shotgun), HDR (Sniper Rifle), and the CR-56 AMAX (Assault Rifle). Over 130 item rewards (Battle Pass and BlackCell related) for those who fully complete the Season 03 BlackCell Battle Pass. Players who upgrade to BlackCell after purchasing the Battle Pass will also receive 1,100 COD Points back. 1: Purchase BlackCell Once in S01 : : 2: Only Purchase BlackCell in S01, S02, and S05 : : 3: Purchase BlackCell Every Season : : BlackCell Loyalty Bonus: Players who purchased BlackCell in a previous Black Ops 6 season and go on to purchase Season 03 BlackCell will earn a permanent 10% Player and Weapon XP Loyalty Bonus, up to 20% for players who purchased Season 01 and Season 02 BlackCell (up to a 50% bonus for purchasing BlackCell in every Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 season!) NEW! Extra Daily Challenges: Players with BlackCell will also receive an additional Daily Challenge throughout Season 03 for Multiplayer, Zombies, and Call of Duty: Warzone. Rake in that XP! Purchase the Battle Pass: Instantly Unlock Mace Operator Players who purchase the premium Season 03 Battle Pass or BlackCell will immediately unlock the Battle Pass Instant Rewards Page with the following items: The new "Mace" Operator and “Mace BlackCell” Mace Skin for BlackCell owners. 10% Battle Pass XP Boost. The “Day Ones” Legendary Weapon Sticker. The “Package Received” Finishing Move. The “Marbled” Legendary Weapon Blueprint for the Saug SMG. New Operator: Mace (Crimson One) Battle Pass Instant Reward Page, HVT The Special Forces Army Ranger turned PMC returns for a new foray into Verdansk, utilizing his brutal and brash tactics to overcome foes who dare challenge him in the field. New Operator: “Hudson” (Rogue Black Ops) Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 2 Follow your instincts and complete the mission as Hudson deploys in aviator glasses, mud smeared over his face and arms with a tactical vest and camo. In the BlackCell variant, Hudson wears a VR interface over a scorched face, debris rising from his left arm. Additional Battle Pass Operator Skins Progress through the Battle Pass to unlock additional content including a variety of Operator Skins, many paired with BlackCell variants with animated fragments floating from their bodies, like Verdansk rubble held in suspension. Woods: “Winter Guise” Skins Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 4 Woods deploys in winter gear, ready to engage in Arklov Peak and other mountainous regions of Verdansk. With climbing rope and gloves, he’ll traverse any snow drift to sneak behind the enemy lines. Swap to a black and gold full body tactr0ical suit in the BlackCell variant, goggles pulled down over a breathing mask. Marshall: “Hazard Prep” Skins Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, Page 6 Marshall isn’t taking any chances as he dons an over-the-head breathing mask and protective clothing to help mitigate the effects of an unpleasant atmosphere. The BlackCell variant offers similar protection in black and gold, fragments floating from his left arm and mask. Maya: “Rogue Archer” Skins Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 7 Strike enemy squads as a tactical gunslinger, hood up with durable lightweight armor and a gun belt hanging at her hip. The BlackCell variant features animated fragments over both arms, sunglasses and a balaclava concealing her identity. Park: “Survivor’s Guile” Skins Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 10 Park deploys in style, wearing a vintage trapper hat and aviator shades with a leather jacket. Swap the hat for a beret in the BlackCell variant paired with a black jacket and mask. Mace: “Apocalypse King” Skins Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 12 Rule over Verdansk and instill fear in your foes as Mace wears a skull mask with rising bones like a crown. Spiked forearm guards accent the skeletal look. Flames burn under the mask in the BlackCell variant, fragments rising from his armor and crown. Stone: “All Terrain” Skins Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, Page 13 Adapt to any environment as Stone deploys in fatigues and full-face coverage for concealment when striking deep in enemy territory. The fragments rising off his right side in the BlackCell variant lend Stone a more sinister twist.   Caine: “Future Combatant” Skin Operator Skin, Battle Pass, Page 14 Show the present what it means to be a cut above the rest as Caine gets teched up with a precision optical instrument and full tactical gear.  Hudson: “Icebreaker” Skins Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 14 Hudson sports shades and a beanie over animated blue sleeves like water pulsing through his arms. In the BlackCell variant, change out the shades for goggles and full animated fragmentation down both arms. Toro: “Jug-o-Not” Skins Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, Page Completion Toro deploys in heavy armor, a bandolier draped over his shoulder. Don a slightly sleeker look in the BlackCell variant, black with gold accents, fragments burned across the faceplate and left arm. Season 03: Battle Pass Base Weapons Unlock two new Base Weapons in the Season 03 Battle Pass, each one a Verdansk-era favorite returning for the fight. All players can unlock these weapons for free by progressing through their listed Battle Pass Pages.  HDR Sniper Rifle Battle Pass, HVT, Page 3 Levels: 38 MAGS: 3 MAG SIZE: 5 Mastery Badges: Yes Attachments: Optic, Muzzle, Barrel, Underbarrel, Magazine, Rear Grip, Stock, Laser, Fire Mods Customize Options: Skins, Camo and Reticle Unlocks (MP, ZM, WZ), Accessories (1), Decals (1), Stickers (3). Military Camos: 27 (MP, ZM, WZ) Special Camos: 6 (MP, ZM, WZ) Mastery Camos: 12 (MP, ZM, WZ) Anti-material bolt action sniper rifle chambered in 12.7 x 108mm ammunition. Bullets have a lower muzzle velocity but remain devastating even at very long ranges. An Operator’s best friend when up in the Control Tower and other vantage points around Verdansk, the HDR inflicts heavy damage from a long distance, perfect for downing squads before they can even pinpoint your position. Hold your breath while aiming to help zero in on targets before taking the shot. CR-56 AMAX Assault Rifle Battle Pass, HVT, Page 6 Levels: 42 MAGS: 3 MAG SIZE: 30 Mastery Badges: Yes Attachments: Optic, Muzzle, Barrel, Underbarrel, Magazine, Rear Grip, Stock, Laser, Fire Mods Customize Options: Skins, Camo and Reticle Unlocks (MP, ZM, WZ), Accessories (1), Decals (1), Stickers (3). Military Camos: 27 (MP, ZM, WZ) Special Camos: 6 (MP, ZM, WZ) Mastery Camos: 12 (MP, ZM, WZ) This lightweight 7.62 x 39mm full-auto assault rifle is compact and powerful. Built exclusively for military use, the standard issue rifle is deadly at mid-range combat and easily configured for a variety of assault tactics. A fast fire rate and solid handling give the CR-56 AMAX just what it needs to excel in mid-range fights. Its fast reloads help to minimize downtime so you can keep up the pressure, eliminating unarmored enemies in three to four shots up to 25 meters out. New Weapon Attachments The Monolithic Suppressor returns for all your big map stealth needs, joined by a full-auto conversion kit for the SWAT 5.56 Grau. SWAT 5.56 Grau Conversion (Launch) Premium Battle Pass, Page 5 Convert the SWAT 5.56 into a fully automatic weapon with lower damage and range but improved accuracy, mobility, and handling. Equips a new default Barrel and Magazine and unlocks an exclusive 50-round extended Magazine. Blocks Barrel attachments. Monolithic Suppressor (Launch) Premium Battle Pass, Page 7 The Monolithic Supressor provides superior sound suppression and increased range. Moderate weight increase affects agility. The ideal attachment for extending your damage range on big maps like Verdansk while retaining the concealment provided by a suppressor. Unlockable Weapon Blueprints The Season 03 Battle Pass and BlackCell feature over 20 earnable Weapon Blueprints, including the following themed armaments: (Above Image) “Marbled” Saug SMG, Instant Reward “Most Wanted MVP” AMES 85 Assault Rifle, Page 3 “Contra-Banned” Stryder .22 Pistol, Page 6 “Glint” HDR Sniper Rifle (White Tracers), Page 11 (Above Image) “Trench Wrecker” Marine SP Shotgun, Page 1 (not shown) “Conflict Victor” Feng 82 LMG, Page 1 “Old Timer” TR2 Marksman Rifle, Page 2 “Industrial” AS VAL Assault Rifle, Page 9 “Shatter” ASG-89 Shotgun, Page 9 (Above Image) “Rebarchuck” Nunchaku Melee, Page 2 “Bandaged” Cypher 091 Assault Rifle, Page 4 “Stained Steel” Cleaver Melee, Page 12 “Caution Handler” PPSh-41 SMG, Page 14 (Above Image) “Sweet Treat” C9 SMG, Page 5 “Damascus Reloaded” GPMG-7 LMG, Page 5 “Novaburst” Tanto .22 SMG, Page 8 “Cracked” 9MM PM Pistol, Page 11 (Above Image) “Wildlife” Kompakt 92 SMG, Page 10 “Edward Returns” Model L Assault Rifle, Page 12 “Brush Drum” Maelstrom Shotgun, Page 13 “Verderous Menace” CR-56 AMAX Assault Rifle (Reactive, Toxic Green Tracers), Completion Page (Above Image) “Built Tough” Tsarkov 7.62 Marksman Rifle, Page 7 “Segment” LR 7.62 Sniper Rifle, Page 8 Next, let’s look at the Weapon Blueprints paired with animated BlackCell variants, some featuring Fractal Gold Tracers and Fractal Gold Death FX. (Above) “Energy Siphon” (Mastercraft, Fractal Gold Tracers, Fractal Gold Death FX) XM4 Assault Rifle, BlackCell Instant Reward. (Above) “Conflict Victor” and “Conflict Victor BlackCell” Feng 82 LMG, HVT, Page 1. (Above) “Damascaus Reloaded” and “Damascaus Reloaded BlackCell” GPMG-7 LMG, HVT, Page 5. (Above) “Novaburst” and “Novaburst BlackCell” Tanto .22 SMG, HVT, Page 8. (Above) “Shatter” and “Shatter BlackCell” ASG-89 Shotgun, HVT, Page 9.  (Above) “Glint” (White Tracers) and “Glint BlackCell” (Fractal Gold Tracers, Fractal Gold Death FX) HDR Sniper Rifle, HVT, Page 11. (Above) “Verderous Menace” (Reactive with Toxic Green Tracers) and “Verderous Menace BlackCell” (Reactive with Fractal Gold Tracers and Fractal Gold Death FX) CR-56 AMAX Assault Rifle, HVT, Completion Page. New Equipment Skins and Optic Attachments Get new Equipment Skins for the Combat Axe and Frag Grenade plus four unique Optic Reticles: “Oval Cap” Reticle (Optic Attachment), Page 2 “Severed Steel” Combat Axe Skin (Lethal), Page 4 “Get Cupcaked” Frag Skin (Lethal), Page 5 “Valiant Wings” Reticle (Optic Attachment), Page 8 “Square Off” Reticle (Optic Attachment), Page 9 “Go Splat” Reticle (Optic Attachment), Page 13 New Finishing Moves, Emotes, and Sprays Earn a new selection of Emotes, Finishing Moves, and Sprays, equippable in the “Customize” Menu of the Barracks. Showcase these rewards during matches or (with Emotes) during the Winners’ Circle. A selection of Emotes and Sprays available across the Battle Pass. “Full Body Swing” Finishing Move, Page 5 “Coin Toss” Finishing Move, Page 7 “Planted” Finishing Move, Page 11 “Slide N’ Toss” Finishing Move, Page 13 “Juggler” Emote, Page 1 (shown above) “Crank Job 3D” Emote, Page 6 “Nevermore” Emote, Page 8 (shown above) “Roger That” Emote, Page 10 “Tank Fire” Spray, Page 1 “Woods Stance” Spray, Page 3 (shown above) “Sent to Gulag” Spray, Page 6 (shown above) “Loot Drop” Spray, Page 12 (shown above) “The Chair” Spray, Page 14 (shown above) Additional Battle Pass Content The Season 03 Battle Pass offers a wide variety of content, including items from the following categories: COD Points Weapon Charms Weapon Large Decals Weapon Stickers GobbleGums Finishing Moves Scorestreak Skins Emblems (some animated) Calling Cards (some animated) Loading Screens Clan Tag (BlackCell only) Consumable 2XP & 2WXP Tokens Battle Pass Completion Page: Rewards Complete every Battle Pass Page to access the final Completion Page stacked with awesome content including the following: 200 COD Points “Jug-o-Not” Operator Skin with “Jug-o-Not BlackCell” variant awarded to BlackCell Owners “Verderous Menace” Reactive Weapon Blueprint with “Verderous Menace BlackCell” variant awarded to BlackCell owners “Agent Ready” Animated Emblem “Poison Tilt” Animated Calling Card “Smoked Noggin” Weapon Sticker “Bear-y Sly” Weapon Charm Store Highlights: New Reactive and Mastercraft Blueprints Tracer Pack: Jay and Silent Bob   Bring some mischief to your matches with the “Jay” and “Silent Bob” Operator Skins, deploying with the “Doobie Wreck” LW3A1 Frostline Sniper Rifle and the “Golden Calf” Kompakt 92 SMG, both featuring Blue and Yellow Tracers and Smoke Death FX.  For closer encounters, show them who owns the block with the “Gimme a Light” Finishing Move. Celebrate the high life and take back what’s yours with the “Poppin’ Off” Emote, “Mooby’s” Weapon Charm, animated “In Sync” Calling Card, “Mooby Joint” Large Decal, and the animated “Snoochie Boochie” Emblem. There’s a new duo in town; they’ve been to Hollywood and now these two guys from Jersey are ready for the limelight of Call of Duty. Tracer Pack: Bluntman and Chronic  The blunt-tastic heroes unite as their comic book alter egos. Deploy as “Bluntman” or “Chronic” with the choice of three doobie-themed Weapon Blueprints for their enjoyment: the “Bluntman Stuntman” Krig C Assault Rifle and “Chronic Unapologetic” Jackal PDW SMG with Pink and Purple Tracers and Joint Leaf Death FX, and the “Bong Staff” Bo Staff with Joint Leaf Death FX. Straight from the Bluntcave’s arsenal, beat competition with the “Smoke You Out” Finishing Move and show your love for the chronic with the “Did that Happen?” Emote, animated “Joint Power” Calling Card, animated “Blunts Out, Suit Up” Emblem, and the “Doobage Duo” Spray. Tracer Pack: Digital Dreamin’ Reactive Mastercraft Ultra Skin  Hone your gaming skills with top-of-the-line equipment headlined by the Reactive Mastercraft “Game Over” Assault Rifle for the new CR-56 AMAX, featuring Starstruck Tracers and VR Knockout Death FX along with the Monolithic Suppressor and a new inspect animation that morphs the weapon into a game console. Wield it as the “Pixel” Operator Skin equipped with a Reactive headset and augmented reality tattoos and the gamified “K.O.” Finishing Move. Engage distant targets with the “Pixel Precise!” SVD Sniper Rifle, also featuring Starstruck Tracers and VR Knockout Death FX. Show them they’re not on your level with the “Eezee” Weapon Charm, animated “Monkey Business” Emblem, animated “It’s Over” Calling Card, “Not on My Level” Spray, “XD” Emote, and “Logging In” Loading Screen. Tracer Pack: Spectral Wolf Mastercraft Declare your dominance over the spirits with the “Phantom Fenrir” Mastercraft Kilo 141 Weapon Blueprint, the ghostly wolf’s head open wide at the barrel. Get two more Weapon Blueprints to lead the pack, the “Threatening Howl” DM-10 and the “Pack Leader” AS VAL. All three Blueprints feature Teal and Black Tracers and Claw Mark Death FX. Wield the essence of the beast with the “Moonlit Awakening” Weapon Charm, “Bear Paw” Reticle, “Gathering” Gun Screen, “Untamed Spirit” Loading Screen, and the “Ethereal Claw” Emblem. Tracer Pack: Comic Bonanza Nail down the plot holes and create your own heroic story with this comic book inspired Bundle featuring three paneled Weapon Blueprints: the “Retcon” Blueprint for the new Nail Gun Special Weapon, the “Single Issue” AK-74 Assault Rifle, and the “Comic Cutout” Cleaver Melee Weapon. All three feature Comic Bubbles Death FX, plus Red and Yellow Tracers for the Nail Gun and AK-74. Say goodbye to your foes with the “One. Two.” Finishing Move and be the comic book hero by displaying the “Big Boom!” Weapon Charm, “Panel Pop” Spray, and “Stand Heroically” Emblem. Tracer Pack: Shattered Veil Reactive  Inspired by the Black Ops 4 Zombies map “Dead of the Night,” direct the fury of the dead with the intricate “Corrupted Séance” Model L Assault Rifle and “Haunted Portrait” XMG LMG, both with Ice Tracers and Ghost Death FX. For undead prey, unleash the “Ectoplasmic Construct” DRI-11 Wonder Weapon Skin. Plus, built for longevity, deploy as the “Steel Butler” Operator Skin for Klaus. Mercilessly taunt your enemies with the “Peek-a-Boo” Emote, “Candelabra” Weapon Charm, “Evil Mirror” Weapon Sticker, “Local Haunt” Loading Screen, and “Join Me” Spray. To assist in your next Zombies match, get one Perk-a-holic GobbleGum and a one-hour Double XP Token. Tracer Pack: Radwaste Reactive Maintain the delicate balance between immense power and melting down with two rad Weapon Blueprints built to thrive in the wastelands: the “Reactive Overload” LR 7.62 Sniper Rifle with ethereal smoke rising from its body and the “Becquerel Monitor” PP-919 SMG, both featuring Teal and Black Tracers and X-Ray Death FX. Deploy in a black hazmat suit and gas mask with the “Undying Radiation” Operator Skin for Toro, and dominate the competition with the "Detonate” Emote. The Bundle also comes with a Reticle, Weapon Charm, animated Loading Screen, Emblem, and Calling Card. Tracer Pack: Cardboard Commando Ultra Skin Deploy as Bayan’s DIY straight-off-the-craft-table “Carton Robo” Ultra Skin, proving that even cardboard can hurt by wielding the “Cut Out” TR2 Marksman Rifle and the “Crafted” PU-21 LMG, both featuring Pink and White Tracers and Box ‘Em Up Death FX. Astonish your enemies with the “Surprise Gift” Emote and stay crafty by displaying the “Aircraft” Weapon Charm, “Carboard Cannon” Hand Cannon Blueprint, “Makeshift” Loading Screen, and “Fully Stocked” Spray. Tracer Pack: Deep Water Ultra Skin Whether on land or sea, the “Big T” Ultra Skin is ready to seek its prey, a hammerhead shark with blood-drenched jaws paired with three ocean-themed Weapon Blueprints: the “Gilled” Jackal PDW SMG, “Serrated Denticle” Krig C Assault Rifle, and the “Prey Stalker” Stryder .22 Pistol, all three featuring Red Tracers and Fish Bones Death FX. Hammer your way to the top of the food chain with the “Half Off” Emote, animated “360 Wielder” Calling Card, “Sea Hammer” Weapon Sticker, and “Hammer Hunter” Loading Screen. Additional Bundle: Plus, coming this Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Military Appreciation Month presented by USAA, be on the lookout for the C.O.D.E. United Force: Tracer Pack and the C.O.D.E. Got Your Six Event. Upgrade to Black Ops 6 Today!  Black Ops 6 is available now, and there’s never been a better time to experience the spy action thriller Campaign, the in-depth tactical chaos of best-in-class Multiplayer, and soak in the gory glory of an incredible round-based Zombies experience! Click here to Purchase Black Ops 6. The Truth Lies. © 2025 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, CALL OF DUTY WARZONE, and CALL OF DUTY BLACK OPS are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. All other trademarks and trade names are the property of their respective owners. For more information, please visit www.callofduty.com and www.youtube.com/callofduty, and follow @Activision and @CallofDuty on X, Instagram, and Facebook. For Call of Duty Updates, follow @CODUpdates on X.
html:
April 02, 2025

by Call of Duty Staff

Track down the Pantheon moles with assistance from the Season 03 Battle Pass, featuring 100+ rewards including Mace and Hudson, plus Verdansk-era base weapons like the CR-56 AMAX and HDR. Get more with BlackCell variants and new in-Store Bundles like Jay and Silent Bob, the C.O.D.E. United Force Tracer Pack, and more.

Finish the Job with the Season 03 Battle Pass!

Special Agent Jason Hudson has evidence pointing to the identities of the Pantheon moles who have been working in the shadows. It’s time to finish the job he started and track down the traitors with some help from the BlackCell, Battle Pass, and Store content arriving in Season 03 of Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty: Warzone™, launching April 2 and April 3 respectively.

The Season 03 Battle Pass introduces 100+ rewards including new free base weapons plus new Operators and Operator Skins, Weapon Blueprints, Calling Cards, Finishing Moves, and more. 

Access free rewards including new cosmetic content and base weapons or purchase the premium Battle Pass and earn up to 1,100 COD Points as you progress through the Battle Pass Pages. For the optimal seasonal experience, purchase BlackCell, including exclusive animated Operator Skins, Weapon Blueprints, and other rewards.

BlackCell Season 03: R0-Z3 Operator (Crimson One)

BlackCell Instant Rewards Page, HVT

The return of Verdansk marks the comeback of several Operators with extensive experience in the locale. R0-Z3 leads the Season 03 BlackCell content in her “R0-Z3” Operator Skin alongside a host of other unlockable BlackCell content including additional Operator Skins and Weapon Blueprints sporting animated fragmentation.

Additional BlackCell Instant Rewards Content

Get the ultimate Battle Pass experience by purchasing BlackCell, offering complete access to all the rewards available in the Season 03 Battle Pass. A purchase grants immediate access to the BlackCell Instant Rewards page, giving the following items:

  • 20 Battle Pass Tier Skips
  • 1,100 COD Points
  • The “R0-Z3” BlackCell Operator
  • The “Energy Siphon” Mastercraft Blueprint for the XM4 Assault Rifle
  • The “Goodest Boy” Companion Finishing Move
  • The “Martial Arts” Emote
  • The “BlackCell” Clan Tag (showcased in Lobbies and Winner’s Circles)
  • BlackCell Daily Challenge (see below)

BlackCell owners can additionally unlock page after page of additional rewards throughout the Season 03 Battle Pass, including:

  • Up to 10 BlackCell-exclusive skins for Mace (two skins), Hudson (two skins), Woods, Marshall, Maya, Park, Stone, and Toro.
  • Up to seven BlackCell-exclusive Weapon Blueprints for the XM4 (Assault Rifle), Feng 82 (LMG), GPMG-7 (LMG), Tanto .22 (SMG), ASG-89 (Shotgun), HDR (Sniper Rifle), and the CR-56 AMAX (Assault Rifle).
  • Over 130 item rewards (Battle Pass and BlackCell related) for those who fully complete the Season 03 BlackCell Battle Pass.

Players who upgrade to BlackCell after purchasing the Battle Pass will also receive 1,100 COD Points back.

1: Purchase BlackCell Once in S01

:

:

2: Only Purchase BlackCell in S01, S02, and S05

:

:

3: Purchase BlackCell Every Season

:

:

BlackCell Loyalty Bonus: Players who purchased BlackCell in a previous Black Ops 6 season and go on to purchase Season 03 BlackCell will earn a permanent 10% Player and Weapon XP Loyalty Bonus, up to 20% for players who purchased Season 01 and Season 02 BlackCell (up to a 50% bonus for purchasing BlackCell in every Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 season!)

NEW! Extra Daily Challenges: Players with BlackCell will also receive an additional Daily Challenge throughout Season 03 for Multiplayer, Zombies, and Call of Duty: Warzone. Rake in that XP!

Purchase the Battle Pass: Instantly Unlock Mace Operator

Players who purchase the premium Season 03 Battle Pass or BlackCell will immediately unlock the Battle Pass Instant Rewards Page with the following items:

  • The new "Mace" Operator and “Mace BlackCell” Mace Skin for BlackCell owners.
  • 10% Battle Pass XP Boost.
  • The “Day Ones” Legendary Weapon Sticker.
  • The “Package Received” Finishing Move.
  • The “Marbled” Legendary Weapon Blueprint for the Saug SMG.

New Operator: Mace (Crimson One)

Battle Pass Instant Reward Page, HVT

The Special Forces Army Ranger turned PMC returns for a new foray into Verdansk, utilizing his brutal and brash tactics to overcome foes who dare challenge him in the field.

New Operator: “Hudson” (Rogue Black Ops)

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 2

Follow your instincts and complete the mission as Hudson deploys in aviator glasses, mud smeared over his face and arms with a tactical vest and camo. In the BlackCell variant, Hudson wears a VR interface over a scorched face, debris rising from his left arm.

Additional Battle Pass Operator Skins

Progress through the Battle Pass to unlock additional content including a variety of Operator Skins, many paired with BlackCell variants with animated fragments floating from their bodies, like Verdansk rubble held in suspension.

Woods: “Winter Guise” Skins

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 4

Woods deploys in winter gear, ready to engage in Arklov Peak and other mountainous regions of Verdansk. With climbing rope and gloves, he’ll traverse any snow drift to sneak behind the enemy lines. Swap to a black and gold full body tactr0ical suit in the BlackCell variant, goggles pulled down over a breathing mask.

Marshall: “Hazard Prep” Skins

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, Page 6

Marshall isn’t taking any chances as he dons an over-the-head breathing mask and protective clothing to help mitigate the effects of an unpleasant atmosphere. The BlackCell variant offers similar protection in black and gold, fragments floating from his left arm and mask.

Maya: “Rogue Archer” Skins

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 7

Strike enemy squads as a tactical gunslinger, hood up with durable lightweight armor and a gun belt hanging at her hip. The BlackCell variant features animated fragments over both arms, sunglasses and a balaclava concealing her identity.

Park: “Survivor’s Guile” Skins

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 10

Park deploys in style, wearing a vintage trapper hat and aviator shades with a leather jacket. Swap the hat for a beret in the BlackCell variant paired with a black jacket and mask.

Mace: “Apocalypse King” Skins

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 12

Rule over Verdansk and instill fear in your foes as Mace wears a skull mask with rising bones like a crown. Spiked forearm guards accent the skeletal look. Flames burn under the mask in the BlackCell variant, fragments rising from his armor and crown.

Stone: “All Terrain” Skins

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, Page 13

Adapt to any environment as Stone deploys in fatigues and full-face coverage for concealment when striking deep in enemy territory. The fragments rising off his right side in the BlackCell variant lend Stone a more sinister twist.  

Caine: “Future Combatant” Skin

Operator Skin, Battle Pass, Page 14

Show the present what it means to be a cut above the rest as Caine gets teched up with a precision optical instrument and full tactical gear. 

Hudson: “Icebreaker” Skins

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, HVT, Page 14

Hudson sports shades and a beanie over animated blue sleeves like water pulsing through his arms. In the BlackCell variant, change out the shades for goggles and full animated fragmentation down both arms.

Toro: “Jug-o-Not” Skins

Operator Skins, Battle Pass and BlackCell, Page Completion

Toro deploys in heavy armor, a bandolier draped over his shoulder. Don a slightly sleeker look in the BlackCell variant, black with gold accents, fragments burned across the faceplate and left arm.

Season 03: Battle Pass Base Weapons

Unlock two new Base Weapons in the Season 03 Battle Pass, each one a Verdansk-era favorite returning for the fight. All players can unlock these weapons for free by progressing through their listed Battle Pass Pages. 

HDR Sniper Rifle

Battle Pass, HVT, Page 3

Levels: 38

MAGS: 3

MAG SIZE: 5

Mastery Badges: Yes

Attachments: Optic, Muzzle, Barrel, Underbarrel, Magazine, Rear Grip, Stock, Laser, Fire Mods

Customize Options: Skins, Camo and Reticle Unlocks (MP, ZM, WZ), Accessories (1), Decals (1), Stickers (3).

Military Camos: 27 (MP, ZM, WZ)

Special Camos: 6 (MP, ZM, WZ)

Mastery Camos: 12 (MP, ZM, WZ)

Anti-material bolt action sniper rifle chambered in 12.7 x 108mm ammunition. Bullets have a lower muzzle velocity but remain devastating even at very long ranges.

An Operator’s best friend when up in the Control Tower and other vantage points around Verdansk, the HDR inflicts heavy damage from a long distance, perfect for downing squads before they can even pinpoint your position. Hold your breath while aiming to help zero in on targets before taking the shot.

CR-56 AMAX Assault Rifle

Battle Pass, HVT, Page 6

Levels: 42

MAGS: 3

MAG SIZE: 30

Mastery Badges: Yes

Attachments: Optic, Muzzle, Barrel, Underbarrel, Magazine, Rear Grip, Stock, Laser, Fire Mods

Customize Options: Skins, Camo and Reticle Unlocks (MP, ZM, WZ), Accessories (1), Decals (1), Stickers (3).

Military Camos: 27 (MP, ZM, WZ)

Special Camos: 6 (MP, ZM, WZ)

Mastery Camos: 12 (MP, ZM, WZ)

This lightweight 7.62 x 39mm full-auto assault rifle is compact and powerful. Built exclusively for military use, the standard issue rifle is deadly at mid-range combat and easily configured for a variety of assault tactics.

A fast fire rate and solid handling give the CR-56 AMAX just what it needs to excel in mid-range fights. Its fast reloads help to minimize downtime so you can keep up the pressure, eliminating unarmored enemies in three to four shots up to 25 meters out.

New Weapon Attachments

The Monolithic Suppressor returns for all your big map stealth needs, joined by a full-auto conversion kit for the SWAT 5.56 Grau.

SWAT 5.56 Grau Conversion (Launch)

Premium Battle Pass, Page 5

Convert the SWAT 5.56 into a fully automatic weapon with lower damage and range but improved accuracy, mobility, and handling. Equips a new default Barrel and Magazine and unlocks an exclusive 50-round extended Magazine. Blocks Barrel attachments.

Monolithic Suppressor (Launch)

Premium Battle Pass, Page 7

The Monolithic Supressor provides superior sound suppression and increased range. Moderate weight increase affects agility. The ideal attachment for extending your damage range on big maps like Verdansk while retaining the concealment provided by a suppressor.

  • “Jug-o-Not” Operator Skin with “Jug-o-Not BlackCell” variant awarded to BlackCell Owners

Store Highlights: New Reactive and Mastercraft Blueprints

Tracer Pack: Jay and Silent Bob  

Bring some mischief to your matches with the “Jay” and “Silent Bob” Operator Skins, deploying with the “Doobie Wreck” LW3A1 Frostline Sniper Rifle and the “Golden Calf” Kompakt 92 SMG, both featuring Blue and Yellow Tracers and Smoke Death FX.  For closer encounters, show them who owns the block with the “Gimme a Light” Finishing Move.

Celebrate the high life and take back what’s yours with the “Poppin’ Off” Emote, “Mooby’s” Weapon Charm, animated “In Sync” Calling Card, “Mooby Joint” Large Decal, and the animated “Snoochie Boochie” Emblem. There’s a new duo in town; they’ve been to Hollywood and now these two guys from Jersey are ready for the limelight of Call of Duty.

Tracer Pack: Bluntman and Chronic 

The blunt-tastic heroes unite as their comic book alter egos. Deploy as “Bluntman” or “Chronic” with the choice of three doobie-themed Weapon Blueprints for their enjoyment: the “Bluntman Stuntman” Krig C Assault Rifle and “Chronic Unapologetic” Jackal PDW SMG with Pink and Purple Tracers and Joint Leaf Death FX, and the “Bong Staff” Bo Staff with Joint Leaf Death FX.

Straight from the Bluntcave’s arsenal, beat competition with the “Smoke You Out” Finishing Move and show your love for the chronic with the “Did that Happen?” Emote, animated “Joint Power” Calling Card, animated “Blunts Out, Suit Up” Emblem, and the “Doobage Duo” Spray.

Tracer Pack: Digital Dreamin’ Reactive Mastercraft Ultra Skin 

Hone your gaming skills with top-of-the-line equipment headlined by the Reactive Mastercraft “Game Over” Assault Rifle for the new CR-56 AMAX, featuring Starstruck Tracers and VR Knockout Death FX along with the Monolithic Suppressor and a new inspect animation that morphs the weapon into a game console. Wield it as the “Pixel” Operator Skin equipped with a Reactive headset and augmented reality tattoos and the gamified “K.O.” Finishing Move.

Engage distant targets with the “Pixel Precise!” SVD Sniper Rifle, also featuring Starstruck Tracers and VR Knockout Death FX. Show them they’re not on your level with the “Eezee” Weapon Charm, animated “Monkey Business” Emblem, animated “It’s Over” Calling Card, “Not on My Level” Spray, “XD” Emote, and “Logging In” Loading Screen.

Tracer Pack: Spectral Wolf Mastercraft

Declare your dominance over the spirits with the “Phantom Fenrir” Mastercraft Kilo 141 Weapon Blueprint, the ghostly wolf’s head open wide at the barrel. Get two more Weapon Blueprints to lead the pack, the “Threatening Howl” DM-10 and the “Pack Leader” AS VAL. All three Blueprints feature Teal and Black Tracers and Claw Mark Death FX.

Wield the essence of the beast with the “Moonlit Awakening” Weapon Charm, “Bear Paw” Reticle, “Gathering” Gun Screen, “Untamed Spirit” Loading Screen, and the “Ethereal Claw” Emblem.

Tracer Pack: Comic Bonanza

Nail down the plot holes and create your own heroic story with this comic book inspired Bundle featuring three paneled Weapon Blueprints: the “Retcon” Blueprint for the new Nail Gun Special Weapon, the “Single Issue” AK-74 Assault Rifle, and the “Comic Cutout” Cleaver Melee Weapon. All three feature Comic Bubbles Death FX, plus Red and Yellow Tracers for the Nail Gun and AK-74.

Say goodbye to your foes with the “One. Two.” Finishing Move and be the comic book hero by displaying the “Big Boom!” Weapon Charm, “Panel Pop” Spray, and “Stand Heroically” Emblem.

Tracer Pack: Shattered Veil Reactive 

Inspired by the Black Ops 4 Zombies map “Dead of the Night,” direct the fury of the dead with the intricate “Corrupted Séance” Model L Assault Rifle and “Haunted Portrait” XMG LMG, both with Ice Tracers and Ghost Death FX. For undead prey, unleash the “Ectoplasmic Construct” DRI-11 Wonder Weapon Skin. Plus, built for longevity, deploy as the “Steel Butler” Operator Skin for Klaus.

Mercilessly taunt your enemies with the “Peek-a-Boo” Emote, “Candelabra” Weapon Charm, “Evil Mirror” Weapon Sticker, “Local Haunt” Loading Screen, and “Join Me” Spray. To assist in your next Zombies match, get one Perk-a-holic GobbleGum and a one-hour Double XP Token.

Tracer Pack: Radwaste Reactive

Maintain the delicate balance between immense power and melting down with two rad Weapon Blueprints built to thrive in the wastelands: the “Reactive Overload” LR 7.62 Sniper Rifle with ethereal smoke rising from its body and the “Becquerel Monitor” PP-919 SMG, both featuring Teal and Black Tracers and X-Ray Death FX.

Deploy in a black hazmat suit and gas mask with the “Undying Radiation” Operator Skin for Toro, and dominate the competition with the "Detonate” Emote. The Bundle also comes with a Reticle, Weapon Charm, animated Loading Screen, Emblem, and Calling Card.

Tracer Pack: Cardboard Commando Ultra Skin

Deploy as Bayan’s DIY straight-off-the-craft-table “Carton Robo” Ultra Skin, proving that even cardboard can hurt by wielding the “Cut Out” TR2 Marksman Rifle and the “Crafted” PU-21 LMG, both featuring Pink and White Tracers and Box ‘Em Up Death FX.

Astonish your enemies with the “Surprise Gift” Emote and stay crafty by displaying the “Aircraft” Weapon Charm, “Carboard Cannon” Hand Cannon Blueprint, “Makeshift” Loading Screen, and “Fully Stocked” Spray.

Tracer Pack: Deep Water Ultra Skin

Whether on land or sea, the “Big T” Ultra Skin is ready to seek its prey, a hammerhead shark with blood-drenched jaws paired with three ocean-themed Weapon Blueprints: the “Gilled” Jackal PDW SMG, “Serrated Denticle” Krig C Assault Rifle, and the “Prey Stalker” Stryder .22 Pistol, all three featuring Red Tracers and Fish Bones Death FX.

Hammer your way to the top of the food chain with the “Half Off” Emote, animated “360 Wielder” Calling Card, “Sea Hammer” Weapon Sticker, and “Hammer Hunter” Loading Screen.

Additional Bundle: Plus, coming this Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Military Appreciation Month presented by USAA, be on the lookout for the C.O.D.E. United Force: Tracer Pack and the C.O.D.E. Got Your Six Event.
